name: test_e2e_with_logs[222_CMD_FILE_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_FILE_001` |
| **Name** | Shadow file read |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | file_manipulation |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `; cat /etc/shadow`
- **Encoded**: `%3B%20cat%20%2Fetc%2Fshadow`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~18000ms
- **Timestamp**: 03:14:30.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX Traversal] File inclusion attack detected test_id=CMD_FILE_001-1767842070441-uk0m1r pattern_id=CMD_FILE_001 uri=/?q=%3B%20cat%20%2Fetc%2Fshadow client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```

```
